episodes.title: Oroville's CULT leader Brother Isaiah
episodes.description:
Who was this guy? I kept seeing him in the archives, so I decided to investigate! Brother Isaiah, was a self proclaimed faith healer to the sick. He travelled all over and had thousands of faithful followers. 
He finally died in his stone tabernacle in Oroville CA in 1934. We are going to go see if we can find it too!
ALL ACTUAL photos of Brother Isaiah are from the online Meriam Library Archives CSU-Chico

If you enjoy these videos please consider
